title: Web Extension Development for Chrome and Edge
description: Lessons learned from building browser extensions for the Chrome and Edge stores, including Adaptive Cards implementation and cross-browser compatibility.

title: Knowledge Management with Zettelkasten in Obsidian
description: How I'm using the Zettelkasten method in Obsidian to improve my RatVault knowledge management system with custom templates and workflows.

title: Advanced KQL for Real-time Analytics Dashboards
description: Techniques for optimizing Kusto Query Language (KQL) queries to build performant real-time analytics dashboards with time series analysis.
